text: The 2019 Svijany Open was a professional tennis tournament played on clay courts. It was the 7th edition of the tournament which was part of the 2019 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Liberec, Czech Republic between 29 July and 4 August 2019. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Andrej Martin |118 |1 |- | |Attila Balázs |141 |2 |- | |Jiří Veselý |142 |3 |- | |Filippo Baldi |149 |4 |- | |Jay Clarke |153 |5 |- | |Federico Gaio |160 |6 |- | |João Domingues |170 |7 |- | |Federico Coria |172 |8 |- | ~~~~| ~~Facundo Argüello~~ | ~~176~~ | ~~9~~ |- | |Roberto Marcora |183 |10 |- | |Nikola Milojević |188 |11 |- | |Aleksandr Nedovyesov |202 |12 |- | |Marco Trungelliti |206 |13 |- | |Tobias Kamke |225 |14 |- | |Rogério Dutra Silva |227 |15 |- | |Daniel Gimeno Traver |248 |16 |} * 1 Rankings are as of 22 July 2019. ===Other entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Jonáš Forejtek * Jiří Lehečka * Tomáš Macháč * Petr Nouza * David Poljak The following player received entry into the singles main draw as a special exempt: * Mario Vilella Martínez The following players received entry into the singles main draw as alternates: * Fabien Reboul * Michael Vrbenský The following players received entry into the singles main draw using their ITF World Tennis Ranking: * Corentin Denolly * Sadio Doumbia * Peter Heller * Vít Kopřiva * Karim-Mohamed Maamoun The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Pavel Nejedlý * Jaroslav Pospíšil The following player received entry as a lucky loser: * Lubomír Majšajdr ==Champions== ===Singles=== * Nikola Milojević def. Rogério Dutra Silva 6–3, 3–6, 6–4. ===Doubles=== * Jonáš Forejtek / Michael Vrbenský def. Nikola Čačić / Antonio Šančić 6–4, 6–3. ==References== Svijany Open 2019 Svijany Category:Sport in Liberec Category:July 2019 sports events in Europe Category:August 2019 sports events in Europe
title: 2019 Svijany Open
